page.title: 09LIFE STYLES:LANGTON HERRING
page.content: IN BYGONE DAYS WORK WAS A LOT EASIER TO FIND.MOST OF IT WAS TO DO WITH{ {FARMING},THE{SEA ( FISHING AND {COSTGUARDS)}AND THE{VARIOUS SERVICES}. NOW,ON THE{FARMS}THERE IS MODERN MACHINERY SO LESS PEOPLE WORK ON THEM AND THE VERY SMALL ONES HAVE JOINED UP TO MAKE ONE BIG ONE.IN THE OLDEN DAYS PEOPLE MOSTLY ONLY HAD{BIKES}AND {HORSES}SO IT PAID OFF TO WORK AROUND THIS AREA, BUT NOW WE HAVE THE CAR AND MORE PEOPLE WORK IN THE OUTER REGIONS. YEARS AGO YOU COULD LEAVE ONE JOB, START ANOTHER ONE THE NEXT DAY AND GO BACK TO THE FIRST A MONTH LATER AND CARRY ON FROM WHERE YOU LEFT OFF. BUT THE ONLY NOTICABLE CHANGES HAVE BEEN THE{ROADS,}MORE{HOUSES}HAVE BEEN BUILT AND IT WAS A LOT TIDIER BUT OVER ALL{LANGTON HERRING}IS STILL AN UNSPOILT AND QUIET PLACE TO LIVE.
